Course Description

If you are a teacher and the classroom is your office, this course is for you. It doesn't matter whether you are a beginning teacher or have years of experience, Managing Student Behaviour will make or break your day.

Master the skills that make student behaviour work in your favour.

Managing Student Behaviour is a suite of 4 courses.

  1. The ESSENTIALS - A unique view of classroom dynamics that impact on student behaviour. How to dominate student behaviour by just tweaking a few aspects YOUR OWN classroom dynamics.
  2. The SOLUTIONS - (This course) - A look at solutions to common and not so common classroom problems. In this course you will learn how to solve problems before the become problems.
  3. The AUTHORITY - Learn how to become the master of your classroom. Learn the skills that enable managing student behaviour to become second nature. You will become THE AUTHORITY in your classroom and beyond.
  4. The MASTERCLASS - Explore the intricacies of managing student behaviour in classrooms and schools. Fine tune all the skills you have learnt in previous courses. Develop creative and productive methods of applying these skills.

This course includes

  • over 2 hours of quality videos
  • 20 Lectures
  • Solutions to Common and not so common classroom behaviour scenarios;
  • A solution centre for you to list your problem and have it solved.

Managing Student Behaviour separates good teachers from GREAT teachers. Great teachers make student behaviour look easy. Learn what makes them different. The strategies you master in this course will put you in the league of a GREAT teacher.

At the end of this course you will

  • understand the classroom dynamics that impact on student behaviour;
  • recognise teaching strategies that make a difference to student behaviour;
  • be skilled in how to respond to a wide range of student misbehaviours;
  • master a wide repertoire of strategies to apply to any student behaviour encountered.
  • become a better teacher.
You will be provided with
  • supplementary ebooks on Crisis Management in the Classroom;
  • an encyclopedia of ebooks on managing student behaviour.
  • a variety of templates to use when interacting with students;
  • videos on strategies you can apply in your classroom.
title: Managing Student Behaviour - The Solutions
